entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm over eastern sections. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
